metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4399 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in TicklishHoneyBee nodau. It has been rated ascritical. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the filesrc/db.c. The manipulation of the argument value/name leads to sqlinjection. The name of the patch is7a7d737a3929f335b9717ddbd31db91151b69ad2. It is recommended to apply apatch to fix this issue. The identifier of this vulnerability isVDB-215252.

criterions.comment: nodau: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
